numbered_ace_sentences: 2. I wonder what the term "colored" refers to.
3. I wonder whether "colored" refers to every non-Caucasian person.
4. I wonder whether "colored" refers only to African Americans.
5. I am curious about this question.
6. I think that the numbers could change if the meaning of "colored" changes.
7. MLS is more popular in Europe and South America than in the United States.
8. Many MLS players are not from the United States.
9. Soccer is not among the three most popular sports in the United States.
10. I wonder whether these facts explain why the numbers are more equal between people of color and non-people-of-color among players.
11. I wonder whether these facts explain why the numbers are more equal between people of color and non-people-of-color among coaches.
12. I also wonder why the WNBA data is from 2019.
13. The rest of the data is from 2020.
14. I wonder whether the WNBA data is less accurate because of the coronavirus.
